title.text: Service Pack 1 for Forefront Identity Manager 2010 R2 - Synchronization Service (KB2814853)

description.text: This is an important Service Pack for Forefront Identity Manager 2010 R2. It contains design changes, bug  fixes, and enables support for Windows Server 2012, SQL 2012, and SharePoint 2013.  This update also fixes a signing issue described in Microsoft Security Advisory 2749655, which affected hotfix rollup package KB2734159 (build 4.1.2515.0).
